item.title: Perplexity launches Sonar API, taking aim at Google and OpenAI with real-time AI search
item.description: Perplexity's Sonar is a real-time AI search API challenging Google and OpenAI with disruptive pricing and superior performance.

item.title: Tencent introduces ‘Hunyuan3D 2.0,’ AI that speeds up 3D design from days to seconds
item.description: Tencent's Hunyuan3D 2.0 transforms images into detailed 3D models in seconds. This could reshape how industries create virtual content.

item.title: How Axis Security is using Xpander.AI’s agent platform to supercharge customer support ticket management
item.description: Through its partnership with Xpander.AI, Axis has managed to save thousands of hours monthly and grow its team sustainably.

item.title: GDC survey reveals a rocky year of layoffs and AI skepticism for game developers
item.description: The 2025 GDC survey revealed the impact of industry-wide layoffs in 2024 where one of every 11 game developers lost a job.

item.title: X Games will test AI from Google Cloud for judging snowboarding competitions
item.description: Making its debut in Aspen, X Games will leverage AI technology from Google Cloud to enhance objectivity in subjectively judged sports. The aim is to d...
